2451.name: Unknown
2451.message:
Unable to connect to the Internet.

The network may be busy.
Please try again later.

If you are using a Wi-Fi network, the
signal strength may be poor. Please
make sure there are no obstructions
between the console and network
device, and then try again.

If this problem persists, it is possible
that the DNS and proxy-server settings
are incorrect. Please check these
settings under the Internet option in
System Settings.
